Wisdom: الْخُطْوَةُ عِنْدَ الْخَالِقِ بِالرَّغْبَةِ فِيمَا لَدَيْهِ الْخُطْوَةُ عِنْدَ الْمَخْلُوقِ بِالرَّغْبَةِ عَمَّا فِي يَدَيْهِ
enWisdom: Favour is gained in the sight of the Creator by yearning for that which is with Him; favour is gained with the creatures by turning away from what they possess

Wisdom: إِنَّكُمْ إِنْ رَجَوْتُمُ اللَّهَ بَلَغْتُمْ آمَالَكُمْ وَإِنْ رَجَوْتُمْ غَيْرَ اللَّهِ خَابَتْ أَمَانِيُّكُمْ وَآمَالُكُمْ
enWisdom: Verily, if you have hope in Allah you will attain your hopes, but if you have hope in other than Allah then your hopes and aspirations will be frustrated

Wisdom: دَعَاكُمْ رَبُّكُمْ سُبْحَانَهُ فَنَفَرْتُمْ وَوَلَّيْتُمْ وَدَعَاكُمُ الشَّيْطَانُ فَاسْتَجَبْتُمْ وَأَقْبَلْتُمْ
enWisdom: Your Lord, the Glorified, called you but you turned away and fled, and Satan called you so you responded and drew closer [to him]
One who increases his requests from people is humiliated

Wisdom: مَنْ صَانَ نَفْسَهُ عَنِ الْمَسَائِلِ جَلَّ
enWisdom: Whoever protects himself from asking others becomes exalted

Wisdom: مَنْ سَأَلَ غَيْرَ اللَّهِ اسْتَحَقَّ الْحِرْمَانَ
enWisdom: Whoever asks [from] other than Allah deserves to be deprived

Wisdom: لَا تَسْأَلُوا إِلَّا اللَّهَ سُبْحَانَهُ فَإِنَّهُ إِنْ أَعْطَاكُمْ أَكْرَمَكُمْ وَإِنْ مَنَعَكُمْ خَارَ لَكُمْ
enWisdom: Do not ask [from anyone] other than Allah, the Glorified, for indeed if He grants [your wishes to] you, He honours you [at the same time] and if He withholds from you, He does it for your own welfare [and benefit]
